      Subclasses of LanguageRecognizer in langReco.reco 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaselineLanguageRecognizer
      Class BaselineLanguageRecognizer: a baseline language recognition system that "recognizes" the language of a sentence by randomly choosing one language recognized by the recognition system.
